name: 世界通史（三）
comment: 備註：已於上學期選定上課班別(A班或B班)者，下學期嚴禁換班上課。
description:
(A)本課程之目標在於使學生有系統地了解從十五世紀後期至二十一世紀初期，世界歷史發展的主要脈絡，以建立學生對世界史通貫與宏觀之認識，並從中體認西洋文明之特質，以及檢討其優越與不足處，期能儲備學生日後深入修習各西洋斷代歷史之專業學識。
(B)這門課給予學生一個基本概觀，介紹從十六到十九世紀末的歷史發展。雖然本課程以歐洲，北美，東亞為重點，分析各種不同國家，帝國，文化間的相互關係跟介紹這些地區的政治，經濟，社會，文化過程一樣重要。時間範圍從歐洲帝國擴張的開始到西方高度現代性的興起。用英文授課!
goals: Students will be enabled to understand global contexts of historical developments
Students will become aware of the impact of historiography on our view of history
Students will become aware of the interrelations between political, economic, social and cultural forces
syllabus:
9/10   Introduction: A Eurocentric World – A Europe of Diversity

9/17   Societal Developments

9/24   停課 9/25, 17.30h! Imperial Domination

10/01  停課

10/08  Mass Exodus to the New World   

10/15  Isolationism and Great Power Ambition  

10/22  “A War that Nobody Really Wanted”?

10/29  World War I: “The Great Seminal Catastrophe of This Century”

11/05  Russian Revolution

11/12  Peace Settlements and Revisionism  

11/19  Imperial Revival and Retreat

11/26  Modern Times and New Orders

12/03  Economic Recovery and Great Depression

12/10  Fascism and Anti-Fascism

12/17  Reluctant Interventionism

12/24  World War II: Occupation, Resistance and Genocide

12/31  停課 (12/22  Interwar Cultures)

01/08  期末考

methodologies.note: Teacher will introduce the core content of each historical phase
Each session will conclude with a time slot for concluding remarks from both teacher and students
Students will be encouraged to raise questions on both, content and language levels, and will have the chance to contribute to the solutions
Students will be working together on selected sources and documents

grading.note: Written exam about the core content of the course
Individual presentation on targeted assignment; the content of the presentation has to be handed in as a 1000 word written text in English within two weeks after the presentation!
